long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Junction allows you to search multiple sources with one click.


FEATURES
~~~~~~~~

- Highlight and search for selected text or enter search terms into the Search box to get results.

- Results are displayed in new tabs in the same browser window or in new browser windows depending on your choice.

- Change order of returned results by dragging and dropping categories.

- You can easily add new sites to search, add new categories and hide categories you don't need displayed.

- Search Junction is malware-free and does not violate your privacy in any way whatsoever.

*At no point is your personal data required, needed or stored.*


Let's go...

Ready. Set. Search.
